mapper.select: SELECT b.income, b.expend, b.id, b.create_time as date FROM bill b WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.create_time BETWEEN ( SELECT date_add( STR_TO_DATE(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL - DAY ( STR_TO_DATE(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) + 1 DAY ) AS firstDay ) AND STR_TO_DATE(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d');

SELECT bd.create_time as date, p.`name`, bd.num, bd.price, bd.bill_type, bd.balance FROM bill_detail bd LEFT JOIN product p ON bd.product_id = p.id WHERE bd.create_time BETWEEN ( SELECT date_add( STR_TO_DATE(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL - DAY (STR_TO_DATE(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')) + 1 DAY ) ) AND date_add(#{date},INTERVAL '1' DAY) and bd.bill_id=#{id} GROUP BY DAY (bd.create_time);
